subject: Math
name: Equation Word Problems
description: Students will learn how to model equations from a given word problem. They will understand what the variable represents in a real world context and be able to solve for the variable.

questions.questionText: Benny received 72 dollars for his birthday. He went to a sporting goods store and bought a baseball glove, baseball, and bat. He had 18 dollars left over, how much did he spent on the baseball gear?
